DataType.Description: PubSub IP addresses: IPAddress_Skill is the address where the SAMYCore is Publishing and the SAMYPlugIn is Subscribed; IPAddress_Status is the address where the SAMYCore is Subscribed and the SAMYCore is Publishing

Field.Name: IPAddress_Skill
Field.Description: IPAddress_1: SAMYCore Publish here, SAMYPlugIn is Subscribed here

Field.Name: IPAddress_Status
Field.Description: IPAddress_1: SAMYCore is Subscribed here, SAMYPlugIn is Publishing here

Field.Name: POUND
Field.Description: Malfunction of the device or any of its peripherals.

Field.Name: fraction
Field.Description: Fraction value between fractionMin and fractionMax

Field.Name: Requested_Skill
Field.Description: Indicates the current requested skill by the SAMYCore to be executed by the robot

Field.Name: Requested_Skill_Success
Field.Description: Indicates whether the Requested_Skill" was succesfully executed by the robot

Field.Name: Active
Field.Description: Indicates whether the robot is executing the Requested_Skill or it is in idle

Field.Name: Online
Field.Description: Indicates whether communication with the robot PlugIn could be stablished

Field.Name: IPAddresses
Field.Description: IPAddresses where the Requested_Skills (IPAddress_Skill) and Status (IPAddress_Status) are published

Field.Name: x
Field.Description: i of the CRCL 3D Point DataType

Field.Name: y
Field.Description: j of the CRCL 3D Point DataType

Field.Name: z
Field.Description: k of the CRCL 3D Point DataType

Field.Name: i
Field.Description: i of the CRCL 3D Vector DataType

Field.Name: j
Field.Description: j of the CRCL 3D Vector DataType

Field.Name: k
Field.Description: k of the CRCL 3D Vector DataType

Field.Name: OVER_MAX
Field.Description: GuardLimit is over the maximum (value exceeded a fixed limit)

Field.Name: UNDER_MIN
Field.Description: GuardLimit is under the minimum (value is less than a fixed minimum)

Field.Name: INCREASE_OVER_LIMIT
Field.Description: GuardLimit: value increased from the starting value by more than the limit

Field.Name: DECREASE_BEYOND_LIMIT
Field.Description: GuardLimit: value decrease from the starting value by more than the limit

DataType.Description: CRCL Status of a CRCL command

Field.Name: programmFile
Field.Description: CRCL name of the file with the CRCL commands

DataType.Description: CRCL State of a count sensor
CRCL State of a OnOff sensor
CRCL State of a scalar sensor
CRCL State of a count sensor

Field.Name: holdingObject
Field.Description: Gripper with or without an object.

Field.Name: jointMaxTorqueOrForce
Field.Description: max torque or force of joint
